text: Identity Thief is a 2013 comedy movie starring Jason Bateman and Melissa McCarthy. Bateman plays Sandy in this comedy. McCarthy plays Diana, the woman who stole Sandy's identity. Amanda Peet is also part of the cast. This movie received negative reviews. Yet, it debuted at number one in the United States. Category:2013 comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:American comedy movies
title: Identity Thief
